data.text:
Now, in to the last straight! 
With a lead of 5 to 6 lengths, Silence Suzuka!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Now, in to the last straight! 
<story>With a lead of 5 to 6 lengths, Silence Suzuka!

data.text:
And here they press the attack and chase forward! Can Silence 
Suzuka do it?! There isn't much distance left between them!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>And here they press the attack and chase forward! Can Silence 
<story>Suzuka do it?! There isn't much distance left between them!

data.text:
But Silence Suzuka accelerates here!! With her "Escape and 
Follow Through", the difference increases again!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>But Silence Suzuka accelerates here!! With her "Escape and 
<story>Follow Through", the difference increases again!

data.text:
Silence Suzuka! It's Silence Suzuka!! 
Silence Suzuka crosses the goal first!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>Silence Suzuka! It's Silence Suzuka!! 
<story>Silence Suzuka crosses the goal first!!

data.text:
This time too, "Escape and Follow Through" Silence 
Suzuka is going strong! Surpassing all expectations, 
she claims an overwhelming victory!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>This time too, "Escape and Follow Through" Silence 
<story>Suzuka is going strong! Surpassing all expectations, 
<story>she claims an overwhelming victory!

data.text: As I thought, running is fun…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka

data.text:
From now on, that "scenery" that's never been seen before. 
Together, with everyone…!
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>From now on, that "scenery" that's never been seen before. 
<story>Together, with everyone…!
